title: 68: Team Blake/Team Caelynn
itunes:title: 68: Team Blake/Team Caelynn
description:
(TRIGGER WARNING: Sexual assault is discussed and the personal texts between Blake and Caelynn are read) The Broads and the #broadsquad decided that a separate episode all about the Blake/Caelynn BIP & Instagram drama was necessary. They read the posts and posted texts from Instagram, discuss their opinions, spill some TEA regarding their relationship and production, praise Reddit, chat cancel culture, a little Demi drama for fun, and more! 
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
